name: The Patisserie - Neckcandy
description:
* The Patisserie handmade bead necklace features 20 beads in soft pastels, rich chocolate tones and fun sprinkle confetti. Wear the romance of a Parisienne Patisserie around your neck and the smell of sugar kissed bonbons, light as air macarons and perfectly frosted cupcakes will follow you everywhere!

* 20 beads with an eclectic mix of round, donut shaped and feature beads strung on a strong waxed cotton cord in tan. 

* The drop of the necklace is 34cm (14 inches) and the entire length of the cord is approximately 68cm (28 inches). The cord features a sliding knot so you can easily adjust the length of the necklace. (Length can be custom made to order. Just leave me a note when you place your order).

* The beads are hand rolled, so not two beads are alike. Minor marks and imperfections add to the charm of this handmade piece.

* FREE SHIPPING within Australia. Your necklace will be sent in a padded bag via Australia Post.

name: Confetti Cake - Neckcandy
description:
* The Confetti Cake is a gorgeous handmade statement necklace with white fluffy frosting like beads embellished with soft pastel confetti. The white round and donut shaped beads are offset by a lone baby blue bead that makes the necklace truly pop!!

* 11 beads in all. 3 confetti feature beads. 1 blue donut bead. 7 white beads with a mix of donut and round shapes.

* Necklace is strung on a natural hemp cord and the drop of the necklace is approximately 34cm (14 inches) with the total length of the cord being 64cm (28 inches). The cord has a sliding knot so you can easily adjust the length of the necklace.

* Beads are hand rolled, so no two beads are alike. There are minor marks and imperfections due to the handmade nature which only add to the charm of this lovely piece.

* FREE Shipping within Australia. Necklace will be sent in a padded bag via regular Australia Post.

name: The Sunny Side Up Necklace - Double Sided!
description:
* The "Sunny Side Up" necklace is handmade and features a cute and quirky double-sided fried egg strung on a tan coloured waxed cotton cord. Yes!! Double-sided!! So when your gorgeous pendant swings around, you have a yolk at the back too. Now if only breakfast eggs were served that way, what a perfect world this would be!

* Diameter of fried egg is approximately 5cm.

* Drop of necklace is approximately 34cm (14 inches). Full length of cord is approximately 68cm (28 inches). (I can custom make the length of the necklace, just leave me a note when you place your order.)

* Cord is soft waxed cotton (color - tan), gentle on skin and features a sliding knot so you can adjust the length of the necklace to your liking.

* Double sided necklace means, there is a yolk on either side!

* This necklace is handmade, so no two eggs are alike. But they are always delicious! *pinky promise*

* Minor marks and imperfections add to the handmade charm of this lovely piece.

* Free Shipping anywhere in Australia. Your necklace will be sent in a padded bag by regular post.

name: Macaron Box - Neckcandy
description:
From the whimsical bazaar of Tasty Circus comes a beautifully minimal handcrafted polymer clay bead necklace with donut shaped beads called Macaron Box. Playful, hip and utterly stunning!! Bright with juicy colours!


**ABOUT THE NECKLACE - 8 beads in all. They are donut shaped with a matt finish. A mix of brights, neons and neutrals .. like your favourite Macaron combination of hazelnut, raspberry, rose, vanilla, pistachio and lemon. Sweet and sinful!

**The beads are threaded on a "natural" waxed cotton cord with adjustable knots that you can use to customise the length of the necklace to your liking. 

**The full length of the necklace is approximately 32 cm (approximately 12.5 inches). 

**Each bead is hand rolled and so no two beads are alike. Minor marks and imperfections add to the natural charm of this piece of neck candy.

** Your necklace will be sent in a padded bag via Standard Australia Post.

** Each necklace is handcrafted by me with love and care.

**FREE SHIPPING WITHIN AUSTRALIA**

name: Choc Chip Peppermint Ice Cream - Neckcandy
description: From the whimsical bazaar of Tasty Circus comes a beautifully minimal handcrafted polymer clay bead necklace with donut shaped beads called Choc Chip Peppermint Ice Cream. Cool down your neck with this charming piece. **ABOUT THE NECKLACE - 9 beads in all. They are donut and barrel shaped with a matt finish. The fresh zingy flavour of choc-chip and peppermint ice cream is brought to life with pastel mint and rich chocolate coloured beads. There is a cute little feature bead with flecks of chocolate chips on it (pretend of course, don't lick it!) **The beads are threaded on a "natural" hemp chord with adjustable knots that you can use to customise the length of the necklace to your liking. **The full length of the necklace is approximately 36 cm (approximately 14 inches). **Each bead is hand rolled and so no two beads are alike. Minor marks and imperfections add to the natural charm of this piece of neck candy. ** Your necklace will be sent gift wrapped in a stylish (and eco-friendly) vintage recipe sheet tied up with jute twine. ** Each necklace is handcrafted by me with love and care. **FREE SHIPPING WITHIN AUSTRALIA**

name: Lemon Granita - Neckcandy
description:
From the whimsical bazaar of Tasty Circus comes a beautifully minimal handcrafted round polymer clay bead necklace called Lemon Granita. Playful, stylish and utterly stunning!! A great party piece or gift.

**ABOUT THE NECKLACE - 9 beads in all. Two yellow and seven pearly glittery marbled beads to mimic the lemon and crushed ice in "Lemon Granita". This is a sophisticated necklace like the dessert it is fashioned after. Lustrous, cool with a splash of the cheeky yellow.

**The beads are threaded on a "natural" hemp chord with adjustable knots that you can use to customise the length of the necklace to your liking. 

**The full length of the necklace is approximately 32cm (approximately 12.5 inches).

** 30cm width including handle.

** Beautiful retro style.
